name: Balrog's Day Out
description:
Balrog's Day Out is the fourth in a series of humorous text adventures featuring the balrog and his troublesome digestive tract.

The first episode in the story saw Balrog happily evacuating his bowels when someone locked him in the outside toilet.

The theme continues through to this game which sees Balrog venture out to a theme park with his family. The general whirling, spinning, chuck-you-about nature of the rides has a predictable effect on Balrog's innards and the object of the game is to get him across the park to the safety of a lavatory, with a coin to operate the door and paper for ..... .

shot.caption: The first of four or five screens that set out the background to the game
The final story telling screen comes to the inevitable conclusion
